generatedDescription.title: Tascam DA-60 Stereo DAT Recorder with Power Cable
generatedDescription.description: Rackmount 2-channel digital audio tape recorder, model DA-60, balanced and unbalanced analog I/O, digital I/O, front LCD status display, transport controls, headphone jack, IEC power cable included, unit powers on and passes audio, tape transport untested
